compliant.section: This Privacy Statement applies to all website or online application that refer to or link to this Privacy Statement.
compliant.legal provisions: Information provided where personal data are collected by other means than via the website, such as paper forms, must be easily accessible and in clear and plain language.

compliant.section: You may choose whether or not to provide certain personal information to us; however, if you do not provide some required personal information, you may not be able to use or obtain the products/services on this Website.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent should not be the legal basis for processing where there is a clear imbalance between the data subject and the controller.

compliant.section: WINBOND will not release your personal information to any irrelevant third party; however, we may provide such information to WINBOND’s affiliates, contractors, distributors or agents to the extent necessary to carry out the Purpose.
compliant.legal provisions: Outlines the requirements for a processor to process personal data on behalf of a controller.

compliant.section: WINBOND also reserves the right to disclose such information to a third party if WINBOND considers any of the following conditions to exist: (1) such disclosure is required by law; (2) such disclosure is required to comply with legal processes or governmental requests; (3) such disclosure is to prevent, investigate, detect, or prosecute criminal offences or attacks on the website; (4) such disclosure is required to protect the rights, property, or safety of WINBOND and the users of this Website; or (5) such disclosure would serve to protect public interest.
compliant.legal provisions: Processing of personal data is lawful if it is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which the controller is subject.

compliant.section: Exercise the Rights You may exercise the following rights: (1) rights of inquiry and request for a review of the personal information; (2) rights to make requests for duplications; (3) rights to make supplements or corrections(rectification); (4) rights to request discontinuation or restriction of collection, processing or use of personal information; (5) rights to request deletion of personal information; (6) rights to withdraw your consent any times; (7) rights of data portability; and (8) rights to lodge your complaint ("Exercise the Rights") .
compliant.article numbers: Articles 15 (Right of access), 16 (Right to rectification), 17 (Right to erasure/ 'right to be forgotten'), 18 (Right to restriction of processing), 20 (Right to data portability), 7(Conditions for consent)
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns well with the data subject rights outlined in the GDPR. It covers rights to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and consent withdrawal.

compliant.section: The Retention of Personal Information You agree that WINBOND may process and use your personal information via proper means in Taiwan, R . O . C . and other countries within the Purposes specified above, and that WINBOND may retain your personal information (i) only for as long as is considered necessary for the Purpose for which it was collected (including as required by applicable law or regulation), (ii) until you withdraw your consent for us to do so, or (iii) until WINBOND ceases to provide products and services to you .
compliant.legal provisions: This section partially complies with GDPR. It acknowledges the principle of storage limitation but needs clarification on what constitutes "necessary" retention and how it aligns with specific legal obligations.

compliant.section: However, where WINBOND is required by mandatory law to retain your personal information or where your personal information is required for WINBOND to assert or defend against legal claims, WINBOND will retain your personal information until the end of the relevant retention period or until the claims in question have been settled .
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with GDPR by recognizing legitimate interests as a legal basis for processing, such as compliance with legal obligations or defending legal claims.

compliant.section: Use of Cookies This Website may send a cookie (a small text file) to your computer in order to facilitate your use of this Website . If you do not wish to receive cookies, you may reset your Internet browser to block all cookies . You may also configure your Internet browser so that you receive a warning before a cookie is stored .
compliant.article numbers: Article 7(Conditions for consent),  Recital 32 (explicit consent for cookies)
compliant.legal provisions: This section partially complies with GDPR. It provides information about cookies and the option to block them. However, it needs to be more explicit about obtaining informed consent for non-essential cookies.

non_compliant.section: Collection of Personal Information You may be required to provide personal information or others may provide your personal information to us, such as name, address, email address, phone number or other contact information by registering a website account in order to use certain services, to locate product information, to purchase products/services, or to seek assistance at this Website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data must be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes.
non_compliant.amend: Clearly specify the legal basis for processing personal data, such as consent, contract, legal obligation, vital interests, public interest, or legitimate interests. If relying on consent, ensure it is freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous, with a clear affirmative action.

non_compliant.section: In addition, when you visit our website, we may collect certain personal information by automated means, such as cookies and web beacons. The personal information we collect in this manner includes IP address, browser characteristics, device characteristics, operating system, language preferences, referring URLs, information on actions taken on our website, and dates and times of website visits.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent. Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous indication of the data subject's wishes by which he or she, by a statement or by a clear affirmative action, signifies agreement to the processing of personal data relating to him or her.
non_compliant.amend: Provide clear and comprehensive information about the use of cookies and similar technologies, including the types of cookies used, the purposes of data collection, and the data subject's rights to manage cookie preferences. Obtain consent for non-essential cookies.

non_compliant.section: Purpose of Processing Personal Information Any personal information WINBOND collects from you or others is used to respond to your inquiries, to send you materials and products, to provide services you request, to provide after-sales service related to the products or services, to provide you with information about products or services, promotions, special offers and other information related to our products or services, to provide you with personalized experience in using this Website, to maintain or upgrade the quality of this Website and the services provided at this Website, or to assess and analyze our market, users, customers, products and services (collectively the “Purpose”).
non_compliant.legal provisions: Personal data shall be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary in relation to the purposes for which they are processed ('data minimisation').
non_compliant.amend: Limit the collection and processing of personal data to what is necessary for the specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes. Avoid collecting excessive or irrelevant information.

non_compliant.section: International Transfer We may transfer personal information we collect about you to countries other than the country in which the personal information originally was collected. Those countries may not have the same data protection laws as the country in which you initially provided the personal information.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transfers of personal data outside the EU are subject to strict rules to ensure that the data protection rights of individuals are protected.
non_compliant.amend: Identify the legal basis for international data transfers, such as adequacy decisions, appropriate safeguards (e.g., standard contractual clauses), or derogations. Implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data during transfers.

non_compliant.section: WINBOND may not take action, however, on your request for exercising your right, if the applicable law stipulates WINBOND is entitled not to do so .
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR outlines specific and limited circumstances where data subject rights can be restricted.  General statements about applicable law are not sufficient. The policy should specify the legal basis for any refusal to fulfill a data subject request.
non_compliant.amend: Revise to clearly state the specific legal grounds (as per GDPR Articles 15-22) that would allow WINBOND to refuse a data subject request. Provide concrete examples relevant to the context.

non_compliant.section: Any exercise of your rights as listed above will result in your not being able to purchase or obtain products or services from WINBOND, to the extent that the Purposes specified herein cannot be attained .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Making the provision of products and services conditional on consent to data processing that is not strictly necessary for those services is generally not allowed under GDPR.
non_compliant.amend: Revise the statement to ensure that the exercise of data subject rights does not disproportionately disadvantage the individual. If processing is essential for a service, this should be made clear upfront, and separate consent should be obtained.

non_compliant.section: To learn more about cookies, you may visit www . cookiecentral . com The WINBOND web server automatically records information incidental to your use of this Website, including but not limited to the name of the domain and host from which you access the Internet, the Internet Protocol (IP) address of the computer you are using, the date and time you access this Website, and the Internet address of the website from which you linked directly to this Website .
non_compliant.legal provisions: While this section mentions data collection, it lacks transparency regarding the specific purpose and legal basis for processing this data.
non_compliant.amend: Provide more specific information about how IP addresses and other automatically collected data are used. Specify the legal basis for processing this data (e.g., legitimate interest for website security). If analytics are involved, clarify this and provide an opt-out mechanism.
